pages.title: Somnium Cooldown Upgrade
pages.text: The Somnium Cooldown Upgrade essence is a powerful tool that reduces the cooldown period for artifacts, rings, and spells. It can be used up to five times to maximize its effectiveness in battle or other situations.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The Somnium Cooldown Upgrade can be crafted in a Somnium Infuser using loran energy and somnium as ingredients.

pages.heading: Recipe
pages.text1: Place Somnium and loran energy in the upper input slots.
pages.text2: To craft Somnium Cooldown Upgrade, place the required items in the test tubes on the left and right.
